attributes.action: SAVE OUR A&E AND MATERNITY  SERVICES AT CRAWLEY HOSPITAL
attributes.additional_details: A decision to close A&E  and Maternity Services was taken recently and for such services to be transferred to East Surrey Hospital PCT. They cannot cope. We want the Health Secretary to re-look at this decision and retain a comprehensive and effective health service Crawley Hospital to serve the needs of the  people of West Sussex
